trans-unit.source: For PDF files added to the site, automatically select the document viewer display.
trans-unit.target: 对于添加到网站的PDF文件,自动选择文档查看器显示。

trans-unit.source: Have an idea? Found a bug? Let us know by opening a ticket.
trans-unit.target: 有想法吗 发现了错误？打开票让我们知道。

trans-unit.source: If on a Linux/Ubuntu/Debian machine you run into an error like:
trans-unit.target: 如果在Linux/Ubuntu/Debian机器上,你会遇到这样的错误。

trans-unit.source: If you choose to use basic file storage instead of ZODB blob storage, there are a few things you’ll want to keep in mind.
trans-unit.target: 如果您选择使用基本文件存储而不是ZODB blob存储，则需要牢记一些注意事项。

trans-unit.source: If you currently have page turner installed, this project will supercede it. Your page turner views will work but no future files added to the site will be converted to page turner.
trans-unit.target: 如果您目前安装了page turner,这个项目将取代它。您的page turner视图将工作,但今后添加到网站的文件将不会被转换为page turner。

trans-unit.source: If you want to be able to serve you files via Amazon Cloud, this will allow you to store the data in flat files that can be synced to another server.
trans-unit.target: 如果你希望能够通过亚马逊云为你的文件提供服务,这将允许你将数据存储在可以同步到另一台服务器的平面文件中。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use it with your own Dexterity content type. You need to edit the
trans-unit.target: 如果你想用自己的灵巧内容类型来使用它。你需要编辑

trans-unit.source: It it highly recommended to install and configure collective.celery in combination with this package. Doing so will manage all PDF conversions processes asynchronously so the user isn’t delayed so much when saving files.
trans-unit.target: 强烈建议 与该软件包结合安装和配置collection.celery。这样做将异步管理所有PDF转换过程，因此在保存文件时不会对用户造成太大的延迟。

trans-unit.source: OpenOffice or LibreOffice (optional, for doc, excel, ppt, etc. types)
PDF Album view for display groups of PDFs.
trans-unit.target: PDF相册视图用于显示一组PDF。

trans-unit.source: Persist converted pdf and publish it as pdf/dump.pdf and @@pdf. [jaroel]
trans-unit.target: Persistez le pdf converti et publiez-le en tant que pdf/dump.pdf et @@pdf.[jaroel]

trans-unit.source: Plain text indexation is fixed for non converted contents. [thomasdesvenain]
trans-unit.target: L'indexation en texte brut est fixée pour les contenus non convertis.[thomasdesvenain]

trans-unit.source: Show contributor fullname if possible. Contributor and organization are in a span. [thomasdesvenain]
trans-unit.target: Indiquez le nom complet du contributeur si possible.Le contributeur et l'organisation sont dans une même fourchette.[thomasdesvenain]

trans-unit.source: Since in Plone’s delete operation, it can be interrupted and the deletion of a file on the OS system system can not be done within a transaction, no files are ever deleted. However, there is an action you can put in a cron task to clean up your file storage directory. Just call the url
trans-unit.target: 由于在Plone的删除操作中，它可以被中断，并且无法在事务内完成OS系统系统上文件的删除，因此不会删除任何文件。但是，您可以在cron任务中执行一项操作，以清理文件存储目录。只需拨打网址

trans-unit.source: Special instructions for CentOS have been contributed by Eric Tyrer. You can access them via the git hub repo file location.
trans-unit.target: Eric Tyrer为CentOS提供了特殊说明。您可以通过git hub repo文件位置访问它们。

trans-unit.source: Special instructions for Debian have been contributed by Leonardo J. Caballero G. You can access them via the git hub repo file location.
trans-unit.target: Leonardo J. Caballero G为Debian提供了特殊说明。您可以通过git hub repo文件位置访问它们。

trans-unit.target: 该产品可以通过控制面板项目进行配置。

This product was developed by Wildcard Corp. team.
trans-unit.target: 本产品由Wildcard Corp.团队开发。

trans-unit.source: To convert all existing views, go to
trans-unit.target: 要转换所有现有视图,请到

trans-unit.target: 要转换现有的视图,在每个启用翻页器的文件上,会有一个按钮。

trans-unit.source: Types that should automatically be converted to document viewer.
trans-unit.target: 应自动转换为文档查看器的类型。

trans-unit.source: Use Nginx to then serve the file system files. This might require you install a local Nginx just for serving file storage on the Plone server. You can get creative with how your file storage is used though.
trans-unit.target: 然后使用Nginx来提供文件系统文件。这可能需要您安装本地Nginx，仅用于在Plone服务器上提供文件存储。不过，您可以在如何使用文件存储方面发挥创意。

trans-unit.source: When PDF files are added and modified, automatically convert.
trans-unit.target: 当PDF文件被添加和修改时,自动转换。

trans-unit.source: When a new release of the document is currently generated, user is notified by a status message. [thomasdesvenain]
trans-unit.target: Lorsqu'une nouvelle version du document est générée,l'utilisateur en est informé par un message de statut.[thomasdesvenain]

trans-unit.source: Where are the server to store the files.
trans-unit.target: 服务器存放文件的地方。

trans-unit.source: Works with many different document types.
trans-unit.target: 可与多种不同的文档类型配合使用。

trans-unit.source: You can be seen in action the functionality that implements this add-on at the following sites:
trans-unit.target: 您可以在以下网站看到实现该附加组件的功能。

trans-unit.source: You can contribute for any message missing or other new languages, join us at Plone Collective Team into Transifex.net service with all world Plone translators community.
trans-unit.target: 您可以为任何缺少的消息或其他新语言做出贡献，并与Plone集体团队一起加入Transifex.net服务，与世界各地的Plone译者社区一起。

trans-unit.source: add ability to add annotations and sections

ajouter le support de l'image de plomb [vangheem]

trans-unit.source: add redirect timeout to conversion info page
add support for alternative md5sum binary [vangheem]
trans-unit.target: steun toevoegen voor alternatieve md5sum binaire [vangheem].

trans-unit.target: Unterstützung für neue Formate hinzufügen:star office,ps,photoshop,visio,handfläche

trans-unit.source: be able to completely hide contributor [vangheem]
trans-unit.target: être capable de cacher complètement le contributeur [vangheem]

trans-unit.source: be able to customize batch size
be able to detect if pdf already has text in it and do not OCR it if it does.
trans-unit.target: in der Lage sein,zu erkennen,ob ein PDF bereits Text enthält,und ihn nicht mit OCR zu erkennen,wenn dies der Fall ist.

trans-unit.source: be able to move jobs to front of queue
trans-unit.target: in der Lage sein,Jobs vor die Warteschlange zu verschieben

trans-unit.source: be able to obfuscate file paths for file storage
trans-unit.target: in der Lage sein,Dateipfade für die Dateispeicherung zu verschleiern

trans-unit.source: be able to override width of viewer
trans-unit.target: in der Lage sein,die Breite des Betrachters zu überschreiben

trans-unit.source: be able to remove document viewer conversion tasks [vangheem]
trans-unit.target: in staat zijn om de conversietaken van de documentviewer te verwijderen [vangheem].

trans-unit.source: be able to use collective.celery for queuing tasks [vangheem]
trans-unit.target: pouvoir utiliser collective.celery pour la mise en file d'attente des tâches [vangheem].

trans-unit.source: better async integration with quota setting [vangheem]
better handling of moving folders around
trans-unit.target: Bessere Handhabung des Verschiebens von Ordnern

trans-unit.source: better integrate with pdfpal and pageturner so it’s easy to upgrade from those products. [vangheem]
trans-unit.target: 与pdfpal和pageturner更好地集成，因此可以轻松地从这些产品升级。[vangheem]

trans-unit.source: better logging when looking for binary files
trans-unit.target: bessere Protokollierung bei der Suche nach Binärdateien

trans-unit.source: better pdf group view with search [vangheem]
trans-unit.target: beter pdf-beeld van de groep met zoeken [vangheem]

trans-unit.source: changing image type does not cause existing ones to fail. [vangheem]
trans-unit.target: 改变图像类型不会导致现有图像失败。[vangheem]

trans-unit.source: check for quota set before finding existing jobs.
trans-unit.target: prüfen,ob die Quote festgelegt wurde,bevor Sie bestehende Arbeitsplätze finden.

trans-unit.source: check if file has already been converted by storing hash of the file to check against. [vangheem]
trans-unit.target: controleer of het bestand al is geconverteerd door hash van het bestand op te slaan om het te controleren.[vangheem]

trans-unit.source: convert button should work for files that do not have layout selected yet
trans-unit.target: Die Schaltfläche "Konvertieren" sollte für Dateien funktionieren,bei denen das Layout noch nicht ausgewählt ist

trans-unit.source: create local catalog and index before syncing db to prevent conflict errors.
trans-unit.target: Erstellen eines lokalen Katalogs und Index vor der Synchronisierung von db,um Konfliktfehler zu vermeiden.

trans-unit.source: default OCR to being off since it’s pretty slow
trans-unit.target: 默认OCR处于关闭状态，因为它非常慢

trans-unit.source: do not assume pdfpal is used along with pageturner on data conversion.
trans-unit.target: gehen Sie nicht davon aus,dass pdfpal zusammen mit pageturner zur Datenkonvertierung verwendet wird.
ne pas convertir les types d'images [vangheem].

trans-unit.source: do not require docsplit to be installed on the plone instance in order to display the viewer. In case the document was converted on another client. [vangheem]
trans-unit.target: 不需要在 plone 实例上安装 docsplit 才能显示查看器。如果文档是在其他客户端上转换的。[vangheem]

trans-unit.source: do not support upgrading from wildcard.pdfpal and wc.pageturner anymore. Use 3.x series [vangheem]
trans-unit.target: ne sont plus compatibles avec la mise à jour de wildcard.pdfpal et wc.pageturner.Utilisez la série 3.x [vangheem]

trans-unit.source: fix bug when using blob storage and text indexing is disabled [gbastien]

trans-unit.source: handle no blob found on content [vangheem]
trans-unit.target: ne traite aucun blob trouvé sur le contenu [vangheem].

trans-unit.source: use communicate instead of wait with popen in case output is large. Prevents deadlocks.
trans-unit.target: Verwenden Sie communicate,anstatt mit popen zu warten,wenn die Ausgabe groß ist.Verhindert Deadlocks.

trans-unit.source: use portal_catalog instead of uid_catalog so security checks apply to resource urls.
